snippet: The musical, based on the 2003 movie about a father-son relationship and the power of mythic storytelling, will begin performances on Sept. 5 at the Neil Simon Theater with Bobby Steggert and Kate Baldwin joining Norbert Leo Butz.
abstract: The musical, based on the 2003 movie about a father-son relationship and the power of mythic storytelling, will begin performances on Sept. 5 at the Neil Simon Theater with Bobby Steggert and Kate Baldwin joining Norbert Leo Butz.

headline.main: 'Big Fish' to Open on Broadway in the Fall
headline.print_headline: ‘Big Fish’ on Broadway Set for the Fall Season
